text: Rives-du-Loir-en-Anjou is a commune in the Maine-et-Loire department in western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Villevêque (the seat) and Soucelles.Arrêté préfectoral 8 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Maine-et-Loire department ==References== Category:Communes of Maine-et-Loire
title: Rives-du-Loir-en-Anjou
